bzh.plealog.bioinfo.ui.carto.drawer

Class BasicFeatureDrawingLane

  • java.lang.Object
    • bzh.plealog.bioinfo.ui.carto.drawer.DrawingLaneBase
      • bzh.plealog.bioinfo.ui.carto.drawer.BasicFeatureDrawingLane
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    DrawingLane, FeatureDrawingLane, SViewerSelectionListener, EventListener

    public class BasicFeatureDrawingLane
extends DrawingLaneBase
implements FeatureDrawingLane
    This class is used to draw a features.
    Author:
    Patrick G. Durand
